content:
## This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

## Get the initial code
1. `Fork` the repository
2. `Clone` the forked repo
3. Run `npm install` to install the dependencies
4. Create a branch for you solution (e.g. `git checkout -b develop`)

## Develop the project
1. Run `npm start` to run a development server at `http://localhost:3000`

2. Write the code inside the `src/` folder.

3. Run `npm run lint` to check the code style and fix all the errors

4. Commit and push all the recent changes

## Prepare for code review
1. Create a `Pull Request` (`PR`) from the forked repo `(<branch_name>)` to the original repo (`develop`)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "yugokraft-admin",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@material-ui/core": "^4.11.0",
    "@progress/kendo-react-pdf": "^3.16.0",
    "@react-pdf/renderer": "^1.6.11",
    "@testing-library/jest-dom": "^4.2.4",
    "@testing-library/react": "^9.3.2",
    "@testing-library/user-event": "^7.1.2",
    "axios": "^0.19.2",
    "classnames": "^2.2.6",
    "date-fns": "^2.16.1",
    "env-cmd": "^10.1.0",
    "formik": "^2.1.5",
    "history": "^5.0.0",
    "i18n-js": "^3.7.1",
    "jspdf": "^2.1.1",
    "jwt-decode": "^3.1.2",
    "lodash": "^4.17.20",
    "node-sass": "^4.14.1",
    "primeicons": "^4.0.0",
    "primereact": "^4.1.2",
    "react": "^16.13.1",
    "react-datepicker": "^3.3.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.13.1",
    "react-dropdown": "^1.9.0",
    "react-export-excel": "^0.5.3",
    "react-jutsu": "^3.0.1",
    "react-redux": "^7.2.1",
    "react-router": "^5.2.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.2.0",
    "react-scripts": "^3.4.3",
    "react-to-pdf": "0.0.13",
    "react-transition-group": "^1.2.1",
    "redux": "^4.0.5",
    "redux-devtools-extension": "^2.13.8",
    "redux-thunk": "^2.3.0",
    "uuidv4": "^6.2.0",
    "yup": "^0.29.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "env-cmd react-scripts start",
    "build": "env-cmd react-scripts build",
    "test": "env-cmd react-scripts test",
    "eject": "env-cmd react-scripts eject",
    "lint": "eslint \"**/*.{js,jsx}\" -c .eslintrc.json --fix",
    "prettier": "prettier --write \"**/*.{js,jsx}\"",
    "doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "browserslist": {
    "production": [
      ">0.2%",
      "not dead",
      "not op_mini all"
    ],
    "development": [
      "last 1 chrome version",
      "last 1 firefox version",
      "last 1 safari version"
    ]
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.2",
    "esdoc-react-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "eslint": "^6.6.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^18.2.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^6.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.22.1",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.3.1",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^3.1.4",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.21.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.1.2",
    "husky": "^4.3.0",
    "lint-staged": "^10.4.0",
    "prettier": "^2.1.2",
    "stylelint": "^13.7.2"
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "lint-staged"
    }
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.+(js|jsx)": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
